snippet: With guard Chris Snee weighing season-ending hip surgery, the Giants signed the former Eagles center Dallas Reynolds and cut Da’Rel Scott, the team’s second leading rusher.
abstract: New York Giants' battered offensive line suffers yet another blow as guard Chris Snee considers season-ending hip surgery; team signs Philadelphia Eagles center Dallas Reynolds to compensate for injured players.
lead_paragraph: With guard Chris Snee weighing season-ending hip surgery, the Giants signed the former Eagles center Dallas Reynolds and cut Da’Rel Scott, the team’s second leading rusher.

headline.main: Woes Continue for Giants as Snee Considers Surgery
headline.print_headline: Woes Continue for Giants As Snee Considers Surgery
